Description: Foot sherd of a Chian Wild Goat Style pottery kernos; white slip; glaze fired red-brown; interior: reserved with glaze overlapping from sides; sides and underside glazed; exterior: on leg, above, traces of vertical stripes above chequer band between lines; on foot: three vertical stripes or roughly executed rays.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2184) (phase 2)
